purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the ACS/IEEE AICCSA 2025 conference, encouraging colleagues and students to submit their research work. It provides details about the conference, including the date, location, and submission guidelines. The email also outlines the various tracks for submissions and important deadlines for regular papers, tutorial proposals, and PhD forum papers.
